summary: This document is an email from David J. Giuffrida discussing the liquidity issues and bids received on EuroStoxx and DivStoxx. It indicates a recommendation to hold off on selling due to unfavorable market conditions.

persons.name: David J Giuffrida
persons.context: David J. Giuffrida is the sender of the email discussing market conditions.

persons.name: Jeff
persons.context: Jeff is the recipient of the email, although his full name is not provided.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as a colleague of David J. Giuffrida who is also involved in monitoring bids.

keyFacts: The email discusses liquidity issues affecting bids on EuroStoxx.
DivStoxx are mentioned as being up, but selling is advised against due to wider bid/offers.
David and Paul will continue to seek bids daily to monitor market improvements.
